input_placeholder: Type a message... (Drag & Drop images supported)
new_window: Select a chat from the sidebar, or start a new one.
setting_system_prompt_placeholder: e.g., You are a senior Python developer...
setting_system_prompt_hint: This will be prepended to the built-in tool instructions.
setting_parallel_tool_hint: Allow executing multiple tools simultaneously. Faster but might be unstable on some models.
